value:
I'll wager that my strength will bring
no shame to the great knights of
Altea!

I work with a knight called Abel.
I tend to get carried away, but he
balances me out with his calmness.

You walk around the whole castle
checking in on everyone?
Impressive!

Why not train with me sometime?
Not everyone knows this, but I
used to teach the younger knights.

HA! Sorry—HA! Training! HA!
Talk later! HA!

I have traveled far with a message
for someone important—goes by
$Nu?$k$pI have brought a hello from my
liege!
All right! Let's keep this up!

Not bad, I guess. But I can do
better!
I can't face Prince Marth after this...

I'll show them all what the Bull
can do!

I'm Cain, a cavalier of Altea.
Oh, yes—Cain! Known far and wide
as the Bull!

Sir Jagen used to always lecture
me about my tendency to rush in
without thinking.$k$pBut with you in charge, I don't lose
track of myself in battle and I can
do my job.$k$pThanks, $Nu.$k$pWith you, I can fight with the fire
in my belly but not lose my cool.
That's always been my goal.
I must train harder. I WILL train harder!
They used to call me the Bull. Ha! Cain the Bull!
Stay behind me in battle—I'll cut a path for you!
